data.why:
Possible Module Name: Fsfast::ROI (Misc)

    Abstractions for simplying scripts that interface with the FS-FAST
    and Freesurfer fMRI analysis software
    (http://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/).

    At the moment, limited to parsing information files for easy
    writing of embedded Matlab scripts, but may include actual
    computations and analysis at a later date.

    Also useful for region of interest analyses (ROI), the impetus
    behind writing this module.
